story: Mohamed Nady shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Introduction to Redux
caption: mva.microsoft.com
description: Learn the essential concepts behind Redux programming, and find out how to code Redux apps with TypeScript and React. Get the details on combining reducers.
